name: Business Guys On Planes (dibkins, Jón Kristinsson, toblix, Lu, Wrestlevania)
name_original: Business Guys On Planes (dibkins, Jón Kristinsson, toblix, Lu, Wrestlevania)
description:
A video game! Originally conceived during the winter jam, it emerges at last, a beautiful butterfly. 

By jko, toblix, lu and me, with special guest boss vocal from wrestlevania.

Controls:

Controls will unlock once boss gives you a quest to do.

Mouse to move arm.

WASD to look around.

Click on the phone, click on the documents in the front pocket. 

Swipe furiously to down the posters.
